code: import{configureStore,createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import user from'./store/userSlice';var cart=createSlice({name:'cart',initialState:[{id:0,name:'White and Black',count:2},{id:1,name:'Grey Yordan',count:1}],reducers:{countIncrease:function countIncrease(state,action){state[action.payload].count++;},addItem:function addItem(state,action){state.push(action.payload);}}});var data=[{id:0,title:"White and Black",content:"Born in France",price:120000,url:"https://codingapple1.github.io/shop/shoes1.jpg"},{id:1,title:"Red Knit",content:"Born in Seoul",price:110000,url:"https://codingapple1.github.io/shop/shoes2.jpg"},{id:2,title:"Grey Yordan",content:"Born in the States",price:130000,url:"https://codingapple1.github.io/shop/shoes3.jpg"}];var _user$actions=user.actions,changeName=_user$actions.changeName,increase=_user$actions.increase;export{changeName,increase};var _cart$actions=cart.actions,countIncrease=_cart$actions.countIncrease,addItem=_cart$actions.addItem;export{countIncrease,addItem};export var info=data;export default configureStore({reducer:{user:user.reducer,cart:cart.reducer}});
